EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal and RedMonk Analyst webinar: Your Open Source Playbook for 2016. Please see details below:
Date: January 13, 2016 Time: 9:00 AM PST / 5:00 PM GMT Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers. {{my.save the date:default=edit me}}
Join the Session
We look forward to you joining us! The Pivotal Team
